title: A woman climbed into the lion enclosure at a New York zoo, then posted videos of it on Instagram
text:
caption A woman who climbed into a lion enclosure at the Bronx Zoo in New York posted footage of the incident on Instagram over the weekend. source Instagram/@queenempress_myahlaree

A woman who visited the Bronx Zoo in New York over the weekend climbed over a fence into the lion enclosure.

The woman, who identifies herself on Instagram as Queen Empress Myáh Lareé Israelite, posted several videos of the incident.

In the footage, she can be seen climbing over the fence and waving at and speaking to the animal from just meters away.

The Bronx Zoo filed a complaint alleging criminal trespass, the New York Police Department told CNN.

A woman who climbed over a fence into the African lion enclosure at the Bronx Zoo over the weekend posted videos of the incident on Instagram.

The footage posted by the woman, who calls herself Queen Empress Myáh Lareé Israelite on Instagram, appears to have been captured by someone accompanying her.

She can be seen climbing over the fence into the enclosure and standing just meters from the male lion.

A voice in the background can be heard saying, “You’re not supposed to do that.” The woman says, “I want to get closer to him. I’m sorry.”

Read more: A photographer captured a tender, bromantic nose rub between two male lions, and people are stunned

A second video shows her in the enclosure standing opposite the lion, which stares directly at her.

In a caption, she wrote: “MY SOUL IS PURE THIS IS WHY I MADE IT OUT.”

Another video posted on her page captured her waving to the lion, who was still staring at her.

She can be heard speaking to the lion, apparently in an attempt to provoke a reaction. She refers to the animal as “baby” and says, “I love you.”

The incident was also caught on camera by another visitor at the zoo.

A Bronx Zoo representative told CNN that “this action was a serious violation and unlawful trespass that could have resulted in serious injury or death.”

The zoo filed a complaint alleging criminal trespass, the New York Police Department told CNN.
description: Business Insider - The woman was filmed climbing over a fence, into the African lion enclosure at the Bronx Zoo. She can be heard saying, "I want to get closer to him.". Read more at businessinsider.sg
